website_summaries.verdict: This three-pack is a budget-friendly alternative with plenty to offer. The level of comfort and support is excellent for the price.
pros: This bra distances itself from competitors with convenient single-handed access and an abundance of support
Nursing mothers also appreciate how the cups drop easily for feeding
cons: Some women caution that the padding is a bit thick and uncomfortable, prompting a few to remove it or replace it

customer_reviews.title: With some added adjustments, a good value for large breasted women
customer_reviews.text: I have large breasts - size 42 G/H. These are a bit small, but stretchy enough to still be comfortable and great for the price. I purchased a pack of bra extenders (4 prong) to help get the fit right. Unlike most soft inserts, the inserts that come in these are thick and stay in place well. They also are round instead of the weird triangle shape like others and cup the breast well. The straps are a bit thin and can get twisted easily while wearing, but not anything that's too annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Giova

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Received my bras today and I am happy! My before pregnancy bras (which are a size 34C) were very uncomfortable, they were tight so I had to loosen my straps alot which made my boobs hang low and it was difficult to do anything as my girls would slip out of my bra... These new medium size bras I received today are perfect, they were a bit tight but I am using the extender right now and it feels much better. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Straps fall off shoulders Update I got a email from seller say I would get $18 if I give a positive view with 4 photos. Makes me wonder about other products and their reviews. But I'll still give an update. The straps are still falling off.
customer_reviews.author: glory

customer_reviews.title: Wayyyy Better than what I was expecting for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in XL, I was a 34 D before getting pregnant and now I’m more like a 38 DD OR DDD. These fit perfectly snug, not too tight, not loose. They are super comfortable!! And the nursing clip is super easy to snap and unsnap for when baby comes! The padding in these bras is the perfect amount so my nips are poking through like some of my other nursing bras. These also came with extra straps and clips Incase it’s a tight fit. I will be buying these again if I need more nursing bras. I’m about to see if this company sells other styles as well. Great purchase and amazing price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basic nursing bra!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 38D pre-pregnancy and was a 40D towards the end as my rib cage expanded. I went with the XL after reading other reviews and it fit perfectly! I am now postpartum and size 38DDD and the XL is still perfect and accommodates everything! These bras are very good quality, I would compare them to the motherhood maternity brand bra which is the same type. I like these better though! They're suuuuper comfortable. It's everything you really need in a nursing bra for a great price, and they wear well under any shirt. I will be buying a second set now for sure! I would say to order the same size sports bra you wear.
customer_reviews.author: MrsW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for nursing and only recently received them. I am not sure about their longevity, but for $10 a bra, I honestly do not have high expectations. (I am open to be surprized!) Pre-baby I wear a 38/40 DD and expect to pay around $60-70 for a good bra. I bought the 2x size and it fits me perfectly. With that in mind, these bras have excellent coverage, extremely comfortable, and the extenders are a very nice touch. There is not much support or lift with these bras, however. As someone with heavier breats, its a bit of a bummer, but again, they are much less expensive than I normally buy so I can put up with it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Peshman

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable- first set bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: So these bras are insanely comfortable. I’m at 37 (I go between 36 & 38) DDD and I ordered the 2XL. I would normally get an XL sports bra because I like them fitted but after reviews I decided to size up to the 2X. The band fits fine, no need for extender. I feel like I’m getting good support & my boobs aren’t looking squishy or flat. However, I’ve requested a replacement because they have a strong plastic-y chemical smell to them. I only noticed one other reviewer said they had that problem and she said her replacement fixed it. So I will update when I get the next set!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harring

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy and cheap fabric - avoid!
customer_reviews.text: This product is made from the SCRATCHIEST, cheap material such that I had abrasions and rashes all over my chest and back after wearing it. I am not even bothering to wear them to nurse - I bought another brand for a better price. Also, the sizes are all off - I measured myself and the bra was still snug despite having “sized up”. Do yourself a favor and don’t waste your money on these inferior bras. Breastfeeding is hard enough - you don’t need to add a scouting pad bra to the mix!
customer_reviews.author: AC - SM

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a great nursing bra!
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a 38DD/DDD. Now that I'm breastfeeding, needless to say they are huge and finding a nursing bra that fits comfortably has been a challenge. I bought the XXL after looking at the size chart, worried that I'd be sending them back. I received them today. I love them! They are super comfortable and are exactly what I wanted. The padding in the cups are thicker, not thin like the cheapo bras. And, the cups fully cover my breasts and I don't have to worry about them overflowing out. I've had it on for 5 hours and the straps are comfy and not cutting into my shoulders. I have not one complaint. I am thrilled with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TwinMommy

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are so comfortable. They are exactly what I was looking for. I was a little worried ordering these online because I usually have to try on brass before I buy them to make sure they fit the way I like them to. Anyways I know they are nursing bras but I already started to wear them. I’m 39 weeks pregnant and I just want to be comfortable and these are so soft and have good support. I got the size medium and I’m a size 36B. My sister purchased something similar on amazon but from a different company and hers aren’t as comfortable. I highly recommend these so buy it and you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: S A

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpise
customer_reviews.text: The fit is weird on these bras. Size medium seems tight. But luckily they have extender clips to get the to fit bitter, but the medium cup is lose in me. Which makes sense, I have a small bust. But I doubt the size small would’ve ever really fit either. The nursing clip took some tries to get used to. In theory the clips make sense. However for me, I find it was easier to pull everything down and then back on, defeating the purpose of the bra. I think I would’ve preferred nursing tanks too. Just personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: kitty_pryde

customer_reviews.title: Best for big boobs
customer_reviews.text: Idk why a size medium would need 4 hooks in the back. I guess because the cups are so stretchy to cover a wide variety of sizes. I have small boobs though, so there's too much coverage. I can't pull one side down low enough to nurse I don't feel like because it comes up so high in the middle and on the sides. Also, the band size seems tight for the size. I ended up returning these. I think if you were larger chested they might work better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. I love the option to remove the pads and that they all came with coordinating extenders. Being 22 weeks pregnant with baby two these are all I wear. My only complaints on them would be theres no stitch or anything to keep the pads in place. When washed they tend to migrate through the sides. Then being as they are what they are, they do tend to hold smells. I live in the deep south where it's still well over 90 in late September so we're sweating some. Even washed with sanitizer and color safe bleach the sweat smell is there at times
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy & Supportive
customer_reviews.text: I love to hate these bras. They're super soft, super comfy, and they fit really well. They're not too tight, but they do give pretty good support for a bra with no underwire. However, I cannot get my nursing pads to stick to them, so they end up a rolled up mess whenever I pull my bra down to nurse. The padding inside the bra is also prone to movement and has folded on me a few times. It is an easy fix, though. Overall, I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bras
customer_reviews.text: The bra does the job it provides a quick release of the boobies for baby so thats a plus. What I didnt like was when I would put the bra back on from feeding, the pad always gets folded and you have to fix it every time and move it back in place for comfort. Another thing i dont like is it doesnt provide much support especially when your engorged, which really sucked beause they hurt enough already. Also when I leak a little my nipples stick to the bra and thats painful as well to take it off. Regardless the bras are about 10$ Each which isnt bad when good brad are 2-3x the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for nursing and pumping
customer_reviews.text: This pack of bras is great. They are very comfy--i wear all day and all night. I use them as a pumping bra as well as a nursing bra too. Simply slide the side band over to hold the inner side of the pump flange and then hook main bra cover back up. I bought a large and am happy with it. I'm roughly a 36c now at one month pp. It is comfortable hooked on the last clasps, however it does come with extenders if needed. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Make you sweat even more
customer_reviews.text: Read the material carefully!! When you breast feed your milk is making your breasts warm and you will sweat during sleeping and this bra makes it worse. I got rash and redness all over my breast after sleeping for only 5 hours!! I bought another cotton one and it’s way better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Ala'a

customer_reviews.title: Size up but I’m happy overall.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but a bit small for my growing tatas. I find it difficult to latch and unlatch the cup with one hand. They’re very comfortable but offer very little support so if you’re super tender, or planning on more then a gentle walk I’d grab a different bra. I was a 34GG pre-pregnancy and significantly larger now. I have a lot of spillage on the sides and top. I ordered XL and I should have gone for double or triple X.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lo

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes and yes! These are comfortable and functional!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I have larger breasts and I was worried they wouldn't be supportive enough to wear out to the store or the park, they are! They are extremely comfortable, and definitely wearable out and about. The only thing that I don't love is they come up pretty high and can been seen when I wear some of my vneck shirts. I would absolutely recommend buying these! I always have one on since we are still in that newborn nursing throughout the night phase! Just order them! You'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As long as you read reviews on the fit you should be fine, but I could have gone up two sizes. I’m typically a medium or 34C pre pregnancy, ordered a large and they are fine but an XL may be in my future. These are very comfortable and I haven’t noticed any annoying rubbing spots like other brands I’ve tried. My nipples are noticeable in even thicker bras and the padding seems to be thick enough to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Solid maternity/nursing bra
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to figure out how to feed with these bras but once I found a comfortable position, I have to say these are not only comfortable, they dont shrink or warp in anyway after going through the wash - and theyre washed every other day. I wear these around the house all day. Couple of cons - I originally used the extension back clips but ended up using it as is because after several uses, it does lose its original stiffness/spring and loosens. Also, the straps holding the bra up while feeding (behind the cups) are so thick that it covers my nipples so I have to move them aside since mines point east/west.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, comfy bra
customer_reviews.text: How is this bra so amazing? I’m a 40 D in my 35 week of pregnancy, and I ordered an X-Large and this fits perfectly snug! It has great support, and is very comfortable. The latch and unlatch is very easy, and I think will be easy enough with one hand. I’m shocked with how thick the material is, and how nice the quality feels. The padding can be a little wonky, however... when you unclip and reclip, do a quick feel to make sure things didn’t fold up on you. That’s the only complaint I have, and for this cost, it’s not even a thought. Maybe I’ll try without the pads? I dunno, but I’m happy I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Kjen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for pregnancy too!!
customer_reviews.text: 30 weeks pregnant, at Victoria’s Secret I am measuring at a 36D/DD and wear a medium in my seamless yoga bras. Ordered a Medium and they fit AMAZING!! so soft, so comfortable! Definitely going to be one of my favorite bras from here on out! Clip is easy to get on and off! The pink it’s light and almost a white color. The pads are removeable and a more flattering shape than the traditional pads that have come in other bras. Thicker and more round! I took the pads out right now! Doesn’t give you crazy support but just enough! Can’t say enough good about these!
customer_reviews.author: rcody

customer_reviews.title: Best clothing item that’s ever happened to me
customer_reviews.text: I hardly write reviews, but after nine months of uncomfortable bras while I was pregnant, I found these a few days after my baby was born and am lamenting that I didn’t discover them sooner. They are so supportive, so soft, and even flattering. I LOVE that it’s still a comfortable bra that I can sleep in, but supportive enough to wear out. I also appreciate that the cups are thick enough that I can wear a somewhat bulky nursing pad underneath and you can’t see the shape through the bra. The light pinkish color (almost a white) is super pretty, and my only regret is that I didn’t get more in that color.
customer_reviews.author: EMama

customer_reviews.title: The small straps ruin the product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these bras. The material feels good, and currently being pregnant, I liked the idea that I could keep them after my baby arrives for nursing. However, I should have listened to other reviewers that said the straps are not long enough. When I buy bras I've NEVER had to put a single one on the most loose setting. I'm usually having to tighten straps. But these straps are SO small that it felt uncomfortable the first 5 minutes I had the bra on to try it. I will be returning this product only because of this issue. If the maufacturer someday fixes this, I would consider buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: The breast support
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT for nursing mamas. I spent half the money on 3 that I spent on a single Motherhood Maternity bra & I like the hofish ones better. The top-o-da-boob snaps are a breeze to remove & rehook. Also, I find the added optional back-hook thingies reassuring, as if they're saying "you WILL grow in size & thats OKAY because you just had a baby & all maternity clothing recommends to buy your pre-pregnancy size but like that MAY CHANGE & its ok because we got your back!!".... Yeah. Great purchase. Also, great thing about these: I'm relatively small-chested & I love them, but my sister is also lactating & is a double d & still likes them.
customer_reviews.author: H. McManus

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes and triple yes.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so MANY nursing bras during my pregnancy since many have fallen short of comfort or fit. I ordered an XL which fit perfectly. Before pregnancy I was a 36DDD, and I know I'm certainly larger then that and will be post partum. The fit is dreamy- like I'm wearing nothing- and super comfortable with support. The fact that the bras also come with the extenders and the piece for the straps of you wear tank tops is an added bonus. Finally I have found a nursing/pregnancy bra that is comfortable, supportive and not constricting. Certainly a great buy and price compared to the bras I've bought at Macy's.
customer_reviews.author: E F

customer_reviews.title: The perfect affordable bra for all stages of pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these recently because I'm a fan of the Hofish tanks and I'm glad that these did not disappoint. I needed some support for nicer tops and even for works days when I wanted to wear my belly band instead of my Hofish tank under my scrubs and these bras are so comfortable. They do come a bit high so not very good for lowcut tops but I'm going more for comfort these days. The inserts do move around, but that's to be expected. They have excellent coverage. I'll be buying more to wear through breastfeeding because they're so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love these, will order more
customer_reviews.text: I love these bras. I'm in my first trimester and have been having non-stop breast tenderness since before we found out we're expecting. So my doula recommended getting maternity bras already for added support and comfort, and I needed something comfortable enough to wear to bed (and 24/7) and large enough to fit my previously 32DDDs. The large fits great on the tightest setting. Haven't measured so no idea what I've become but I feel confident I'll be able to wear these throughout my pregnancy and after, and I'll definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Jesseekab

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: I was 40DD after delivery and these worked miracles. I recommend these to all my friends who are pregnant or breastfeeding, and I may just buy these as day to day bras. The support is great, and these are made of an extremely absorbent material, so leaking was not as bad of an issue as it was for me with other maternity bras. My personal main issue was pain with my size, and these offer a lot of relief because the straps stay where you adjust them and don't slide down. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Vela424

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing bra for larger bust
customer_reviews.text: This bra was a game changer for me this time around while nursing. Wish I had them for my first child too. They are supportive for a larger bust like mine, but comfortable enough to sleep in them. I think I will wear them around the house even when I’m not nursing! The only complaint is that the little pad inside goes all over the place so it is a little annoying getting it to lay fly again. The first time I ordered these one of the bras had a piece that wasn’t sewn on and they made an exchange very simple and easy. Was very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love.... But...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason they are getting a 3 star review is because one of the clasps on the bra broke off on the first day of use. The other 2 bras are fine though. Super comfy, I feel fine sleeping in them because they are not restrictive. I love them other than the one bra breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big busts! Full coverage! Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Big busted ladies this bra is heaven! I also have a small rib cage but the fact that the extenders are included are awesome for anyone who might wonder. It feels like nothing on you and I can't wait to sleep with this on sonce I'm lactating and have to wear one with my own inserts for leakage. Super comfortable and amazing price for 3!
customer_reviews.author: Kielman

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bras (3-pack in beige) to use during my pregnancy and after the birth while breastfeeding. They are very comfortable and I am glad I purchased them! My breasts have not become huge, but they are still big enough that my old bras were ill-fitting even with bra extenders. These nursing bras are very soft but are still supportive and they fit very well. I used the size chart provided to place my order and I am very pleased with the product fit. Since I cannot yet comment on how they perform as nursing bras, I will update my review after my baby is born and I use the bras for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Baity

customer_reviews.title: Good support for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly surprised with the fit and support of these bras considering the low price. I am 5'4 and 135lb postpartum, probably between a B and C with milk, and the medium fits great. Even though I'm small busted, I have had trouble finding a nursing bra that both supports and fits my ribcage. It's true that the pad inserts are cheap and look ridiculous, but I bought these bras for sleep/around the house wearing so I just don't use the inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Live4Weekends

customer_reviews.title: Close to being a perfect pumping bra
customer_reviews.text: Good product, soft, breathable material, products good support(I even wore it to the gym to check if it will provide good support and it passed the test). I would leave the pads on as it provides a much better shape. I have tried many different nursing bras sold at Amazon, Target, Motherhood maternity, pea in a pod etc and I feel this bra is close to meeting my expectation as I wear it over the next couple of days. The hooks at the back are not sturdy. Atleast the one I received. I had to stitch it back and wear it and that’s the reason I am giving this a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: pv

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: My first baby is due in a couple weeks and I needed a few inexpensive bras to wear around the house and to bed. I've already started leaking a bit here and there so I'm wearing these bras at night and so far they have been very comfortable. The material is soft and stretchy. I did have to send my first order back and go up a size. The xl fit good, but kind of snug so I swapped for a 2x just to be safe. I feel like this bra will be good for nighttime feedings as well. I plan to update my review once I've had a chance to use it during breastfeeding.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Little extension hooks is awesome idea!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for women who’s breast size and body size change during pregnancy. I’m only 4 month but I already grew * 3 times my normal breast size and usually after having baby they will add couple more sizes ( same happened during first pregnancy). Breast hurt in regular bra and hurt even more when bra is taken off 😣. These feel good and There is chance that these will last throughout whole pregnancy and during breastfeeding thanks to extending hooks in the back. Would hate to keep spending money on bra and other temporary purchases that can only be used during pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nursing bra!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect comfortable bra for nursing! I thought they were quite bulky when I took them out of the packaging, the straps are very wide. But wearing them is it a dream they are so comfortable and stretchy! I was a 34B-C before pregnancy, and ordered a large. So glad I did because my boobs are huge right now. I wear them on the largest loop. The only reason I gave four stars is because the pads inside or not sewn in and I have to fish around inside to put it back into place after nursing. They are very nice quality and I would definitely buy again! The 3 pack is so nice! They also look nice under a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: MamaOski

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not great for lifted support.
customer_reviews.text: These bras are very comfortable and easy for nursing. The material is soft but can be a little warm. The are also comfortable enough to wear to bed if you need extra support while you sleep. The pads in the bra have saved me from completely leaking through to my shirt. You may need to readjust the pads after you wash the bra. The bra is good at keeping everything contained and covered but if you have a bigger cup size, it doesn't really lift them. If you are used to underwire bras there may be some adjustment but overall a good nursing bra.
customer_reviews.author: Betsi Head

customer_reviews.title: Agree, neckline is too high
customer_reviews.text: I bought these since they had really good recent reviews but once it arrived the neckline was really high. I tried wearing something and it looked very conservative. It did not go with my regular tank top. The padding was so also off. It was covering a lot more and was not as comfy and it made me itchy. I’m glad I got this one and another brand on amazon that actually looked and felt better so that I was able to know which one I liked more. I’ll be returning this one soon. If you enjoy high neckline then I recommend but if not I do not.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Iveth Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Great postpartum for comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable nursing bras! Not a fan of the padding so good thing it’s removable. After purchasing the L postpartum, fit great except the padding was too small so I sized up to an XL. I was hoping the padding would cover more of my boob therefore more supportive. But the XL was way too big around the bust=too loose=no support. The clasps seem to get bent and mangled really easily in the wash so this is my second order of the L (best fit sans padding). The large fit seems to work best right after I had my son and was probably a 36 DD/E to now and I’m probably a 36 D/DD.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.C

customer_reviews.title: Best maternity bra! Sooooo comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 30 weeks preggers and now pushing over a 42 DDD, I ordered the XXL. These bras have had the best fit and comfort! It has given me great support and my upper back has actually stopped aching since switching to these, I forget that I am even wearing a bra. They keep my breast in place and do not give me a uniboob. The clasps are sturdy and easy to latch and unlatch, so I am looking forward to the easy access for breastfeeding. Over the years and 3 kidos I have tried nursing bra after nursing bra, these by far offer the most comfort and durability I'm looking for. The price is great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Foster

customer_reviews.title: I cant say enough good things!
customer_reviews.text: I am a very frugal person and when it came time to return to work I had to buy new bras ( the comfy/sport/nursing ones would not cut it with professional attire. These were a life saver!! The price for all 3 had me a bit wary but I could not be more pleased. They are super soft and the clip for nursing/pumping is really well made. I have been using them now for 4 months daily and not one seam has popped, clip has broken or latch has bent. I am going to (and have) recommend these to any women after having a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable bras! They are great for pregnancy and nursing because you change sizes so often and these bras adapt (they come with the back clasp expander). The padding is also removable, which is great for washing! It’s certainly not a flattering bra that lifts, but it does what I need it to while being pregnant....comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing bra
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because you can get 3 of these for the price of one at Motherhood! And these are almost the exact same bra. I was a 38DD and got the XL. They offer good support and coverage. The clasps are easy on and off and seem to be very good quality. I wear these every day since nursing and they are very comfortable. Cons: -The band tends to stretch out as you wear it throught the day. - The stretch material can get hot and makes me sweat whenever I get a little warm. Overall for the price I would definitely recommend these to anyone nursing! Regardless of the cons.
customer_reviews.author: Ls

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!!! A soft comfy nursing bra that FITS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am over the moon excited about these! After getting pregnant, my already busty self has had the hardest time finding a maternity/nursing bra that fits and is actually comfortable. I hate that the sizes are XS-XXL as it seems pretty arbitrary from brand to brand. But these are soft and provide full coverage, plus the extenders they include ensure that you’ll find the notch that fits you. I’m so happy, I’ll probably order another set to cover my bases. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meggan Drennan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the quantity.
customer_reviews.text: Pre-pregnancy I wore a 32DD, and in most sports bras I’d wear a medium or large. I ordered these in large and they fit perfectly. After 4 weeks of wearing them daily and even to bed, and washing them A LOT, they’re holding up surprisingly well. I’m starting to notice a little pilling and some wear on the fabric itself, but it’s not bad. Definitely keep the padding in the bra if you’re also using breast pads, otherwise the breast pads will be obvious. Ultimately I’m impressed by the quality at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the fit of these bras and had only intended to wear them for sleep. I'm pretty impressed with their coverage and lift. I've been wearing them to work and out and about. Very comfortable. I'm wearing a pregnancy bra size of 36DDD and I got the XL. It fits just right and may be a little snug once the baby arrives. At this price point, I wouldn't mind getting another set!
customer_reviews.author: N. McNeal

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe these get so many good reviews. They are very tight and small
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe these get so many good reviews. They are very tight and small, which I guess is why they give you band extenders, but why wouldn't you just make the product the correct size? I'd much rather not have to mess with extenders. The worst part of their design, though, is that the light padding is just sitting in a pocket, just like a cheap bathing suit. Therefore, every time I pull down the flap, the padding gets shifted out of place and bunched up below my breast. Plus the snaps are hard to open. Terrible, terrible, terrible design! These are definitely being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Comfy pre-post natal bras
customer_reviews.text: These bras are great for nursing and during pregnancy. This is my second time ordering a pack of these bras. The first time I ordered them I was pregnant and they were great for comfort as my size shanged. After my son was born I needed more bras so I order these ones again along with another brand. These particular bras are comfortable, wash very easily, the pads are easily removed for a washing. I suggest the pads to be removed when you wash and put them in a bra bag as it will preserve the quality in the life of the bra.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W-P

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is about to be 10 weeks tomorrow, and one of the three bras is just now starting to have a defect. I really like these bras, as they are very comfortable and easy to snap on and off with one hand. This is the one and only nursing bra I purchased so I cannot compare to others. But I would highly suggest them. 10 weeks in, one bra has the inside pad starting to fall apart. One layer has come off (the shiny outer layer), resulting the spongy type of material exposed. But since this is on the inside, it is not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent nursing bra but the pads came off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra and loved it for the first couple of weeks! It's so convenient and very comfortable. It's easy to put on and easy to pull your titty out when nursing. My only gripe is that the pads came off and the cloth that allows it to be easily pulled off came off and now its very inconvenient to adjust the padding. One of the bras I just took out the padding outright because it was such an issue to try and put the padding back on. I contacted HOFISH to see if I can get a replacement but no word from them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mae polancos

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying these
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly comfortable bras. I've been wearing them during my entire pregnancy (sensitive boobs and general discomfort don't feel compatible with regular bras), and plan on wearing them postpartum/for nursing. My only complaint is that after a while, they can get a bit funky. I live in a hot climate and underboob sweat (or breast milk) can make these get a bit gross. But for the price they are at, I just buy new ones when they start to go. I don't really consider this a product flaw - just another undesireable side effect of pregnancy/nursing.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cantley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Comfy Large Fit 38” Band by 42” Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this bra haven’t used one in over two years. Since I am expecting, needed something comfortable with easy access for breastfeeding. Testing these out and am in love. No weird material bothering my skin, pretty sensitive to tags and scratchy material. The band inside does not get in the way of the nip area and makes me so happy. I am about 24 weeks size 38” band & 42” around breast. Bought the large size and have no issue with fitting. If I keep growing I might go up to XL but waiting when I’m closer to delivery. Happy & will order more from this brand over any other I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: So happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprisingly pleased! I bought my regular shirt size, XL. They fit great. I am surprised how supportive they are, much better than other sport type bras. I don’t have the dreaded “uniboob.” I jumped up and down, and “the girls” were supported. They are comfortable and have the characteristics of a regular bra. The only thing that I don’t like is having to smooth out the pads on the inside, but I had to do that with other sports type bras I own anyway. I am so happy and excited to wear these, and the price is extremely reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Em

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable nursing bras!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large in these when I was about 6 months pregnant when I couldn’t fit into my regular bras anymore. I’m 5’7 and at the time I was about 170lbs. I was a 34DD before getting pregnant and I know my boobs have grown since. But there’s no spillage out of the cups and they are comfy! The bras came with extra extenders to make it bigger if need be. I am able to take the clasp off with one hand when getting ready to nurse for future reference for myself. It’s April now and the baby isn’t due till July. However, I wanted a pretty easy comfortable nursing bra and this one seems pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable nursing bra
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are the most comfortable nursing bras I own. They do not work for v neck or slightly lower cut shirts as they do show but work just find for crew neck shirts. I do not get the dreaded wireless nursing bra “uniboob”-you still have your feminine shape. My one complaint is that when I wash them, the pads get severely folded and that affects the way they flatten back out-they now appear lumpy. I think I can solve this by removing the pads and washing them separately in a mesh laundry bag so it’s not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cups are defective!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these bras a little over a month ago and the cups are already peeling apart!! I had other bras from amazon with my last pregnancy that were basically the same and they held up great for an entire year. These didn’t even last a month. I wash them in the washer and dryer like I do everything else as well. I got a large and am only 150ish pounds 5’10 and now a C cup and it’s a bit snug in the band for me, which I guess is why they provide the extenders which is nice. Also whenever I wash them the cups get all bunched up together, which I never had problems with with my other bras.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered according to the sizing chart; normally 36D but ordered XL. I use the smallest closure but there’s room to grow along with baby and nursing later. Very comfortable; I started wearing these around 10 weeks when my regular bras even with extenders became uncormfortable. They come up pretty high so they show with some shirts; I’m going to try purchasing the deep v-neck version. The nude bra was missing one hook on one of the rows; it still works but it’s just a little inconvenient when I forget and try to hook it there. I messaged the seller and they gave me a partial refund, which was appreciated. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Stretch Out Fast
customer_reviews.text: These bras are cheap but you get what you pay for. They stretch out horribly in the band and are basically unsuable by the end of the day becuase they’ve lost all support. You’d get better support going bralesss. They are soft however so that’s nice, but still useless. When the nursing clips are undone it gives even less supoort and the band twists around so that when clipping it back in you’ll also have to completely readjust the entire bra.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: 36C and I went with a medium!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bra on the fence about sizing. I am usually a 36C gal, but with my current pregnancy I was worried these wouldn't support me enough in a size large. So I ordered a medium. They fit perfectly with just enough compression and support like a sports bra but not too tight. The clasp is sturdy for opening and closing over each breast and can be undone with one hand. Absolutely perfect! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: *Jasmine Moore, RN

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit & Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I wore a 36DD/36E prepregnancy and the XL is perfect. I'm 36 weeks pregnant with minimal weight gain. Regular bras with underwire dig into my belly and are unbearable. I can't speak to the ease of breastfeeding with these yet but I can tell you they are extremely comfortable to get you through pregnancy without spending a fortune. I definitely recommend these to any mama out there. I haven't needed the band extenders yet but I love that it is an option.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Parent

customer_reviews.title: The work awesome
customer_reviews.text: I swear I thought they were not gonna work but they are a godsend they work amazing I love it the clip is so easy to unclip and click back on and it also hold my manual breast pumpWhile I am trying to pump I like to use my manual breast pump because it gets out more breastmilk then and then electric pump and I can massage my breasts while pumping these work amazing I really recommend them the quality is perfect they’re soft they don’t bug and the extra clip for more space is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good fabric but purchased different inserts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bras while I was pregnant with my son. I wore them before I started nursing and again when I started nursing. The quality of the fabric is good but I wish the removable cups folded better. When nursing and folding down the cups they seemed really bulky. I also noticed that they showed through many shirts. I ended up purchasing another brand of more absorbant nursing pads to place inside the bra and removed the included inserts. Overall, I've liked these bras but did need to make an additional purchase to make nursing easier. I considered purchasing the tanks they offer instead since they may serve the same function with more coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied - about what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These bras are not exactly sexy, but they're supportive and comfortable, and the clips for holding the cups up stay secure and are easy to latch and unlatch one-handed. I had one of the regular bra clasps bend backwards after about two washes from getting caught on another piece of clothing presumably (I've never had that happen to any of my other bras), so I'm docking one star for quality. I've just started washing them in a mesh bag to stop any more snags, which I sound probably do anyway with my bras, but like I said, it's never been a serious issue.
customer_reviews.author: KellyC

customer_reviews.title: Gaped under the arms
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable, but they gaped under the armpits. I did try the weird buckle in the center, and that helped with the gaping, but I really didn't like to use the weird buckle. I ended up returning them and buying the motherhood maternity bras that look like these, but they fit much better.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive, runs small.
customer_reviews.text: First time expectant mom here. I thought I would invest in nursing bras early rather than waste money on pretty new bras that may not fit afterwards. They are Comfortable, they are supportive. The straps are thick (could be longer) & they do come up rather high. I would not recommend wearing anything low cut with these unless you don't mind them peeking up. They are not padded/lined. Your nipples can be seen poking through. I never slept in bras prior to pregnancy but these are comfortable enough to do just that.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. I started with the large, but it was too small. Couldn’t even clasp them with the extenders. So I returned those and got an extra large. The cups gaped on the sides, and I could only clasp the bra on the loosest setting with the extenders. So I’ll be returning those too. I don’t think I’ll try a larger size because the cup size seemed too big on the extra large, but the band was too small. Idk what’s going on. Going to try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bras.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bras. They came on time. I wore them 24/7 all through my child’s nursing stage, and now that he’s weaned... I still wear them. Mostly because I literally have no regular bras that fit me well, and these are comfy. The only thing I don’t like is that, after I wash them, the bra inserts fly off to one side and I have to poke my fingers inside to maneuver the inserts back in place. Other than that, these bras are comfortable, easy to use, stretchy, and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Great bras during and after pregnancy! Provides extra support
customer_reviews.text: Pluses Easy to unhook for feedings Comfortable - no underwire Soft Affordable Minuses Thick bulky straps Final verdict Overall these bras are great! They are perfect for during the pregnancy (when your normal bras are starting not to fit) as well as postpartum. The only gripe I have is the bulky straps but that’s just a personal preference I think. I appreciate the comfort of these bras but personally my small cup size doesn’t really require the extra support so the heavy duty straps just seem bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it....
customer_reviews.text: I understand that they are a cheap, but seriously they quality is awful. One of the bras came snagged and the cups inside were so folded and creased that I couldn't wear them under anything and I even tried washing them and air drying them still didn't help the creases and the rest of the bras ended up snagged as well.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgieanneP

customer_reviews.title: Fits me more like a sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I used the size chart and purchased the XL (I'm usually a 38B). They are definitely comfortable and soft, but I should have purchased the large. The XL comes up high on my chest and looks more like a sports bra than a bra I can wear under real clothing. The pads give a good shape though so I wear them around the house. All around happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! And sizing thoughts on X-Large
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fabric, great support, easy nursing straps, washes well, just enough padding to wear under tee-shirts, and good coverage. I forget that I have these on--so comfortable! About 8 months pregnant, I'm a 42C/D by measurement (I'm usually a 34C). I'm really sensitive to anything tight around my ribcage, so I usually size up in the bandsize and/or use an extender. I ordered an X-Large in these bras. The cup size is a little too big (some gaping material on top), and the band--even with the extender--was a little tight at first but has stretched to feel perfect. Update: Now that I'm nursing, I fill the whole cup. Amazing bras that truly last the prenatal/postpartum divide.
customer_reviews.author: IAN T LANZILLOTTI

customer_reviews.title: Good fit just a clasp issue on one.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love them. Only issue is the tan one has an imperfection on the clasp. 2 of the clasps are bent funny and I’m afraid they will break over time after bending them back into place. There wasn’t an option for a replacement without shipping all three back. I’d already worn and washed the other 2 so guess I don’t have the option to return anyways. I’m a 40 D and they fit great and are easy to use. Just wish the pads were sewn in so they didn’t bend over themselves when pulled down to nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bras. They run a little large for me but I'm using them pre-milk letdown, so we'll see how they fit later. Sturdy design, I've washed multiple times without any notes wear or tear. The only thing I don't like is the removable padding that tends to bunch or fall out in the wash. I find that new design a pain in the butt, but I think that's a personal peeve. Tends to show if I have a lower cut top on but the front bunching is nice enough to emulate a camisole so it's not super obvious it's my bra peaking out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy for Nursing
customer_reviews.text: I struggled through my pregnancy to find bras that fit as my boobs kept growing. After I gave birth, forget it! None of the bras that I bought fit. I bought these and am so glad that I did. They are really comfortable, fit well, and work well for nursing. I am a 40D and ordered size XL and they fit comfortably. I give them 4 stars only because the pads in the bra shift around when washing and it's a chore to keep having to adjust them.
customer_reviews.author: Leese

customer_reviews.title: A must have for pumping/ breastfeeding moms
customer_reviews.text: I love these nursing bras. I am exclusively pumping and they work well for me. I wear them in the house and out. I am a 38 g and ordered an extra large and it fit perfect and offer enough support. I like the four hooks in the back instead of two or three. I tried another brand because they offered more colors and more quantity but that was a big mistake. The fit was all off so now I am back to these. They never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great, especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: These nursing bras are great so far. I’m not sure how they will hold up to multiple washes as they are pretty new, but overall they are great. They are way more comfortable than the other more expensive nursing bras I had purchased from another company online. The fabric is soft and the cups are super stretchy. I’m still pregnant so it is nice to have the extenders to accommodate my super high bump and allow for some flexibility as I change more and again. I think for the price, these are a great value. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T

customer_reviews.title: Was nervous buying size small, but fits
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews where people had to return size small and buy a medium. I was worried I'd have to do the same. I was a 32C (5'4, 125 lbs). I'm 33 weeks and have gained 25 pounds. The small was tight at first but after one day they stretched out slightly and fit great. I am using the extenders for now. I love the light pink color and they feel very sturdy. I'm really pleased with them. I haven't used them for breastfeeding yet though.
customer_reviews.author: A. T.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best Fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm an extra small/small in maternity clothing so I purchased the size small. While the cup size fits great ('m A/B) my problem is that the back band length is way too small. If this didn't come with the bra extenders there's no way I would have been able to fit into it comfortably. I use the extender on the last set of hooks too. Many times after eating it gets even more uncomfortable I have to unhook it! I think this will fit me better post-partum while nursing, but for a maternity bra, I would not recommend, especially if you have a wide back.
customer_reviews.author: Jadea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in fit
customer_reviews.text: The bras itself look amazing. I was so excited to wear these. As I put it on, it almost suffocated me. And my package did not have the extending pieces in it. I thought maybe I could make it work, but then the straps wouldn’t even extend to a normal length. My chest and back would have to be 2 inches tall to make those straps work. Overall I’m super bummed because these looked so comfortable and I desperately needed a good nursing bra.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, I wouldn't recommend these
customer_reviews.text: These bras would be nice but there are a few things that aren't satisfying. First the padding was bunched up when I received them. Tried to straighten them out but it is still wrinkled and visible. This bra is also not compatible with tank tops which is what I wanted, a more low cut bra since its summer time. Lastly, the bra strap holders are flimsy. They dont hold your bra straps together. They constantly slip off the strap. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Fitgirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, fits great
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and fit great. Very easy to use for nursing. I loved them so much that I ordered three more bras in black. However, read the product description closely as these are the 4-hook style bras with the adjusting strap in the front, and I accidentally ordered a 3-hook style with the adjusting strap in the back. Neither of these changes would bother me, except with the style change the straps would no longer stay on my shoulders! They slip down incessantly, and if I tighten them the bra rides up. I brought this to the company's attention and they offered to exchange them with no issue. I really appreciate their customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke while wearing it at work!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered a set of these bras and they worked well, so I decided to order another set. This set is a little different than the first, and I wore one bra with no issue. The second (nude colored) one that I wore today has just broken. The strap completely came apart and I can’t even see where the seam had been holding it together. I had to rig it by tying it in a knot so that I don’t have to leave work. Disappointed as this color would be the one I’d wear the most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must must buy!
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing bras! I bought them once I was a few mo pregnant and my boobs were hurting from wire bras. So comfy and they look good under anything you wear tshirt, dress, tank, etc. Even better is around 7 mo pregnant they were starting to hurt because the bump was getting bigger and the band was digging into it a little. I popped in the spacer it came with and BAM amazing once again! Love love love! I went and ordered more black in a lower cut style to wear under nicer shirts.
customer_reviews.author: aubreyanne

customer_reviews.title: BEST nursing bra I have tried so far! Reordered another 3 I love them so much!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best and most comfortable nursing bra. I have bought the motherhood brand and other bras that are $50 a piece and I always pick these to wear because they are so comfortable and supportive without being to restrictive. I am currently breastfeeding and these unhook and hook quickly and easily. I was previously a size 34 DD BEFORE pregnancy....not sure what size I measure now that I am breastfeeding (but I am 5'5 and 170 lbs. 1 week postpartum if that helps anyone figure out their sizing.) I ordered an XL and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Raeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Bras at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: For $25 for 3, these are a steal. They’re very similar to what you can get at a place like Target, but those bralette styles are at least $19 each. They are very soft, comfortable & fit pretty well. I’m about a 38D before I was pregnant, so the XL was great with the bra extender (without the extender, I could feel the hooks in my back when it was on the last knotches). The padding is removable & circular (versus trianglular like most padding I’ve seen) & got bunched on me between uses, so just watch out for that.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The bra does its job
customer_reviews.text: It does its job - the cups come down, the clips are easy to hook and unhook and it's comfortable enough. The price is a plus. Cons: the bottom band curls up when I lean forward.
customer_reviews.author: msTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Small, itchy, not very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36 B and ordered the Medium. The actual size of the band laid flat and without stretching is only 28 inches vs my basic VS bra with 31 inches. I found it to be incredibly constricting especially with pregnancy gas and heartburn and couldn't stand to wear it without the extender as far as it would go, which only gives you an extra 2 inches. The straps have very little range and on the max adjustment, they were very short for me (I'm 5'10). I also found the material to be itchy. Not sure why everyone loves these so much.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Thorp

customer_reviews.title: Soft comfy size down to use with freemie cups
customer_reviews.text: Must have for nursing Moms. Soft and comfy and way better than the motherhood maternity brand or other store brands like at Macy or Kohls. Get these. Won't regret. Easy to snap on and off with one hand. Only downside is the padding gets folded at times but I just fix it quickly. If looking for support and shape hmm then not too good of a choice but for nursing and pumping esse, excellent product. Does start to get lint with washing even on gentle cycle. I'm not bothered though. Will replace. At 3 months post partum may need to size down as the medium is no longer snug enough for freemie cups.
customer_reviews.author: Salliee

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had trouble finding good quality, comfortable nursing bras. When I first ordered these 4 years ago I probably got about 6 months out of them before the claps on the back started to fall apart and bend. I ordered a large (usually a 34D and it was WAY too small. I feel that if I had a bigger size they would be comfortable and a good nursing bra for the price. Just ordered an XXL and will update how they fit in a few weeks when baby comes.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin Stroebel

customer_reviews.title: Lots of coverage, comfortable, durable
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable maternity/nursing bras I own. The bras were a lot bigger than I thought, but I'm loving the extra coverage. The chest band on the back is very thick and durable, the adjustable shoulder straps are thin, but it does not dig into my shoulders. The cup pads are removable and big so you don't have to adjust the pads to make sure it's covering your nipples. My other Hofish maternity bras do not have adjustable shoulder straps and the smaller pads kept shifting away from the nipples.
customer_reviews.author: m'goats

customer_reviews.title: Small was not the same as medium
customer_reviews.text: I Previously bought medium right after I delivered and it fit great! I was super happy with the bras. Then I lost weight and needed to get a smaller size so I bought the small. NOT the same product, a little disappointed. Not made from the same material and the padding in the cup is way different. It moves around and bunches up after I nurse. I still have it 3 stars because for nursing bras it’s a pretty good deal. I was just expecting it to be the same as the first product naturally. See pictures for difference.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! If you're reading through reviews trying to decide if these are for you, let me tell you, they are! These are by far the best nursing bras I've purchased. I have many other types, including ones with underwire and ones without. I've been most comfortable and found it easiest to nurse in a sports bra/ bralette type of bra but wanted something with snaps and support. These are it! They're extremely comfortable and give a nice shape. I can flip the cup down to feed baby without them popping up over her face. They're even comfortable enough to sleep in. I bought a medium and feel they're just slightly small, but that's where the extenders come in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: its OK for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: These bras start out fitting you good but after about an hour it is seriously loose and pulling up in the back. Its rather annoying. I didn't like the cups because they look weird after un clipping and pulling it down. I wear it though because they are soft. I wouldn't buy it again though because there are better quality and I never got my money back from the larges that I returned so it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great price and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had these with my first son! They are comfortable, and just enough coverage. I don't feel matronly whilst wearing it and it has great support. I love that they come with extenders too! I will definitely be recommending these to other mom friends. I ordered a large and I wear a 36C and it fits perfectly. I did use the extender to add one more row of clasps because I felt it was just a tiny bit too tight without it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Rexroat

customer_reviews.title: Love these bras!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bras!! I put them on and forget I'm even wearing a bra. I got them before I'm due, so I haven't tried nursing in them, but I love them as a maternity bra. I'm wearing these exclusively now and have no regrets. Extremely soft and the ability to make them bigger is a nice touch. For comparison, I'm still wearing them on the smallest setting and I have another 3 months of pregnancy to go. These should be perfect before and after delivery.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Paver

customer_reviews.title: Get these bras!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bargain. These bras are softer than the Leading Lady bras that I bought in the past for a whole lot more money. The fit is a tiny bit tight, but gives good support. The removable pads are nicely shaped, though I don't intend to use them. My only complaint is that the clips are not quite as easy to fasten as I'd like, it's hard to do them with one hand. But that's certainly not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Linklau

customer_reviews.title: Good value for great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after the birth of my 2nd daughter and while I wound up not breastfeeding, I’m still wearing these bras! Pros: Super comfortable. Machine washable. Easy to adjust/remove/fix the padding when needed. Provides support without bulges, and really for about $10/bra, you can’t beat the value. Cons: The pads will move around during washing, which is a minor annoyance. You will also need the pads to prevent flashing your headlights if you suddenly get chills. My bra size pre-pregnancy was about a 38DDD/F I bought the 2XL and it fits well; I could probably have gone down a size and would have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kate K.

product_meta.title: HOFISH 3PACK Full Bust Seamless Nursing Maternity Bras Bralette S-XXL with Extra Bra Extenders & Clips
product_meta.description:
Product Description
The Hofish nursing Bra was designed to deliver comfortable convenient feeding for womens,this super-snug, classic-fitting bra is perfect for Pregant&Nursing.That's because its compression fit minimizes motion and maxisizes support.So you can go hard without losing your focus.

HOFISH Women's Nursing Bra

Size:S,M.L,XL.(updates on March 31, 2017)
Size S Fit 32BC 30CD 34AB
Size M Fit 34BC 32CD 36AB
Size L Fit 36BC 34CD 38AB
Size XL Fit 38BC 36CD 40AB

Attention Pls:If you're pregnan or breastfeeding ,please consider one size larger than normal ,thank you
Package:3PCS/Pack ,including 3pcs bras +3pcs extra bra clips +3pcs extra bra extenders to ensure maximum comfort

Description
This nursing bra is designed for easy feeding and great comfort.
The bottom band gives additional support which offers you a perfect image.
It is designed both for pregnancy and nursing. You won't regret choosing it. 
The adjustable shoulder straps with extra wide side and triangle-cup design will support your cups well

Features
1.92%Nylon+ 8%Spandex
2.One-hand Access, Adjustable Shoulder Straps, Hook & Eye Closure
3.Seamless, Side Widening, Super Supporting
